ygData.subject: Re: moving bags
ygData.msgSnippet: use the top of the box, near the bag icon...there are some wide areas to grab and drag it around you can also grab the edges, but it s harder to do MacGrough
ygData.messageBody:
use the top of the box, near the 'bag' icon...there are some wide areas to
grab and drag it around
you can also grab the edges, but it's harder to do

MacGrough Mich'Rathe
20th Song Bard - Solusek Ro Wanderers
Aazure
9th Spell Enchantress - Solusek Ro Wanderers

----- Original Message -----
From: Papa Legba <legba@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, January 18, 2000 8:18 AM
Subject: [eqbards] moving bags


> From: Papa Legba <legba@...>
>
> Could anyone tell me how to move my open bag window around on my
> screen? I cannot seem to figure out how to do it, but I do it by
> accident at least once a night...
>
> I was trying to find a way to free up my hot keys a little bit on my
> "swap" bank, and this would allow me to do it (freeing up the INV spots
> I have on it...)
> --
> We now return to the non-stop rock.
>
> Matt DeBarger
